last_episode_to_air.name: Happy Merry Ending?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Seung Jun finally gets his wish and meets Jae Hyun again; what will happen between the two of them?

name: Happy Merry Ending
overview: Seung Jun has been a wedding singer for many years and has become bored with this job. He no longer has any illusions about the romance people yearn for through these ceremonies. One day, he meets Jae Hyun, who is also working at the wedding as a host, and the lively and charming guy in front of him is his ideal type! As the two of them get closer and closer each wedding, the introductory notes of love are starting to play out between them…

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Seung Jun has been a wedding singer for many years and has become bored with this job. He no longer has any illusions about the romance people yearn for through these ceremonies. One day, he meets Jae Hyun, who is also working at the wedding as a host, and the lively and charming guy in front of him is his ideal type! As the two of them get closer and closer each wedding, the introductory notes of love are starting to play out between them…

episodes.name: Welcome to my heart, boy
episodes.overview: At a wedding, Seung Jun is introduced to Jae Hyun, whose friendly demeanor initially makes Seung Jun uneasy.

episodes.name: Him and I
episodes.overview: Despite Jae Hyun's messages and concern for Seung Jun, they do not make the latter feel safe and secure. Instead, they trigger negative memories from the past.

episodes.name: That Dick Who Ruined My Life
episodes.overview: Even though past nightmares continue to haunt Seung Jun, he finally becomes willing to accept Jae Hyun's well-meaning intentions.

episodes.name: The Closer We Get
episodes.overview: Seung Jun makes good on his word to give Jae Hyun vocal lessons, and the two of them gradually become closer.

episodes.name: His Lips on Mine
episodes.overview: Jae Hyun takes the initiative to spend time with Seung Jun when he's depressed, and the relationship between the two of them develops further.

episodes.name: Closing In
episodes.overview: Joo Won does whatever it takes in order to force Seung Jun to come back to his side.

episodes.name: The Temperature of Breakups
episodes.overview: Jae Hyun manages to get to Seung Jun in the nick of time to protect him from Joo Won, but it's because of this that the two of them end their relationship.

episodes.name: Happy Merry Ending?
episodes.overview: Seung Jun finally gets his wish and meets Jae Hyun again; what will happen between the two of them?
